name: The Legend of Lonk
description:
Lonk the Hero is on a quest to protect the kingdom from the evil Slime king. Join lonk as he attacks the slime kingdom, making his way to their kingdom to defeat evil King Slime! Lonk can use his sword to stab the evil slimes with his jab attack. A wall in the way? Never fear, long and his trusty bombs can pave a way to freedom?

Basic top down game, controlling the player with the mouse buttons. Right click is to move, Left click to swing, Space bar to drop a bomb. Goal is to beat the Slime king at the end of the Map. Good luck gamers you will need it.
